allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix iOS build error with expo-gl C++ const std::string

Fixed static assertion error in expo-gl by removing const from
std::set<const std::string> declaration in EXGLNativeContext.h.

Changes:
- Updated expo-gl from 13.6.0 to 14.0.2
- Installed patch-package to apply C++ fix
- Created patch to change std::set<const std::string> to std::set<std::string>
- Added postinstall script to apply patches automatically

This resolves the Xcode build failure with iOS SDK 18.5.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive error handling and logging for VoxelScene rendering

Fixed production build issue where VoxelScene wasn''t rendering:
- Added try-catch blocks around onContextCreate initialization
- Added error handling in animation loop
- Added detailed console logging at each initialization step
- Added component mount/unmount logging
- Added gameKey prop to force proper remount on game start
- Imported Alert API for user-facing error messages

This will help debug why the scene doesn''t render in production builds
and provide better error feedback to developers and users.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
